name: Graph Algorithms
description: Questions about graph theory, traversal algorithms, shortest paths, and minimum spanning trees.

questions.text: What is the time complexity of BFS in a graph with V vertices and E edges?
questions.explanation: BFS visits each vertex once (O(V)) and explores each edge once (O(E)), resulting in O(V + E).

questions.text: Which algorithm finds the shortest path in a weighted graph with negative edges?
questions.explanation: Bellman-Ford can handle negative edge weights, while Dijkstra's assumes all weights are positive.

questions.text: What is the primary difference between Prim's and Kruskal's algorithms?
questions.explanation: Prim's starts with a vertex and grows the tree, while Kruskal's starts with edges sorted by weight.
